Reference

Package

osprey

osprey: Additional general TLGs to tern

Graphs

Graphs

g_butterfly()

Butterfly Plot

g_events_term_id()

Events by Term Plot

g_patient_profile()

Patient Profile Plot

g_spiderplot()

Spider Plot

g_swimlane()

Swimlane Plot

g_waterfall()

Waterfall Plot

spiderplot_simple()

Simple spider plot

Tables

some useful tables

t_ae()

Adverse Events by System Organ Class and Preferred Term

t_ae_ctc_v2()

Adverse Events Table by Highest NCI CTCAE Grade

t_ae_oview()

AE Overview Summary Table

t_ds()

Patient Disposition Table

Remaining

some useful functions

as_pdf()

Output decorated grob (gTree) objects as PDF

grobs2pdf()

Decorate grob (gTree) objects then outputs as IDM compatible PDF

Utility

create_flag_vars()

create AE overview flags

add_ae_class()

Add Adverse Events class

meddra

Meddra data

stream_filter()

Applies STREAM style filtering to datasets

stream_filter_convwhere()

Convert SAS code to R code

stream_filter_index()

Replicates the use of index function in sas for logic options

Elementary Functions

patient_domain_profile()

Patient Domain Profile

Data

rADAE

Random adverse events

rADRS

Random response

rADSL

Random patient listing

rADTR

Random data rADTR

rADTTE

Random Time to Event Analysis Dataset
